name: Mu Pocket (global)
description:
Mu Pocket (Global) is a game made for Mini Jam 45.
Based on the old and original version of Mu, we have an offline RPG

Controls:
Arrow keys = Move
Mouse = Interact
1 and 2 = use pots
Q = Skill
I = Inventory

Sounds from https://opengameart.org
Game made on stream: https://www.twitch.tv/player_dbr

Have fun :) (specially mu players)!!!
